scripts.start-console: npm run start-dev --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage & npm run start-dev --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-console
scripts.start-builder-api: npm run start-dev --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage & npm run start-dev --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-builder-api
scripts.build-test-nohash: npm run build --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-cli && npm run build-nohash --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-test
scripts.serve-test: npm run build --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-cli --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-test && npm run serve --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-test
scripts.publish-test: npm run build --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-cli --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-test && npm run publish --workspace=@kibalabs/everypage-test
scripts.//: NOTE(krishan711): no-verify-access below is because lerna doesn't support automation tokens: https://github.com/lerna/lerna/issues/2788
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name node_modules -exec rm -rf '{}' \;; find . -type d -name dist -exec rm -rf '{}' \;; find . -type f -name package-lock.json -exec rm '{}' \;
